title: Tunbridge Wells
name: Scotney Castle and Gardens
directions: near [[Lamberhurst]], 8 miles/15 minute drive from Tunbridge Wells
content: A National Trust-owned attraction. The small castle, surrounded by a moat, is very picturesque. The castle itself is very small with the well-managed gardens being the main attraction for many visitors. Like many National Trust properties, the tearoom serves delicious cakes.
